title: HALP Reinstall error C++ PLSPLSPLSPLS
body:
Hey i could rlly use some help, I recently system restored my computer, and I tried reinstalling League only to get stuck on the install of Micorsoft C++ 2005. This is the error message I get:

Error 1935.An error occurred during the installation of assembly 'Microsoft.VC80.CRT.type"win32",version="8.0.50727.4053",publicKeyToken="1fc8b3b9a1e18e3b",processorArchitecture="amd64". Please refer to Help and Support for more information.

I tried like installing C++ from microsoft's website and like deleting all old league file's but nothings working. HELP PLSSSS

replies.body: This error is usually due to a missing product on Windows, and happens on new rigs or outdated versions of Windows.  You can manually reinstall [Visual C++](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387) to fix this up, but since it didn't work for your case you may need update Windows.  Those two steps should get this resolved for you!
hey its me again, I tried doing both of those steps but neither worked out for me

No worries, we'd like to help with your case individually.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a look.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs to attach to your ticket, and we'll respond back as soon we can!
